pages.text: Aubergines are mostly used in the druidic arts for their seeds, which store potent amounts of energy - however, there are rituals that are only successful when performed with the entire aubergine.

Some druids speculate that this is because the seeds are in their most potent state while still inside of the fruit - and there are very few druids who wish to carry entire aubergines around in their pockets when the seeds on their own often work just as well.$(br2)Aubergine seeds can be found by breaking tall grass. Aubergines themselves can be crafted into seeds for further propagation.
Aubergines can additionally be obtained by using Runic Shears on fully grown carrots.
